factset.tool_description: Access to public filings and corporate disclosures with vector store capabilities
factset.tool_description_details: Powered by Factset, this tool helps analysts get access to public filings and corporate disclosures with vector store capabilities

factset.tool_description: Access to latest public news with vector store capabilities
factset.tool_description_details: Powered by Factset, this tool helps analysts get access to latest public news

bloomberg.tool_description: Bloomberg market data and company fundamental available through Genie API
bloomberg.tool_description_details: This agent leverages Bloomberg market data to run basic financial analysis across an entire US Equity based portfolio, answering questions about market prices, volatility or investment performance. This capability supports simple types of financial analysis queries, such as Computing daily returns, Identifying Top Performing Stocks, Computing market volatility, Identifying most traded instruments or Getting trades statistic by industry

databricks.tool_description: US equity portfolio data including positions, unlikely to be shared to data providers.
databricks.tool_description_details: US equity portfolio data including positions, unlikely to be shared to data providers.
